title: tAttata dhimita
sahitya:
tAttata dhimita dhimiki enuta hariyADidane


anupallavi

  citta japitanuttama muttina kottugaLa kuttiyoLagetyADuta


caraNam 1    hAra padaka kEyura kirITavu dhIra bApuriyadu vIra hoLeyutire 
mAra janaka sukumAra sAraguNa sAndra mahima hari
    caraNam 2    mandagamanayeru brnda brndadali canda nODutire A 
nanda gOpana kanda mukunda nityAnanda
    caraNam 3    kankaNa vankiyu kinkiNi ravagaLu shanka cakra divya pankaja 
mAleyu shankhagaLa shrI purandara viTTala vEdAnta vEdya krSNa
